verses.roman:
mahāprabhu kahe--"śuna, bhaṭṭa mahā-mati
māyāvādī sannyāsī āmi, nā jāni kṛṣṇa-bhakti

synonyms: mahāprabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu replied; śuna—please hear; bhaṭṭa—My dear Vallabha Bhaṭṭa; mahā-mati—learned scholar; māyāvādī—in the Māyāvāda school; sannyāsī—sannyāsī; āmi—I; nā jāni—I do not know; kṛṣṇa-bhakti—devotional service to Kṛṣṇa.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu replied, "My dear Vallabha Bhaṭṭa, you are a learned scholar. Kindly listen to Me. I am a sannyāsī of the Māyāvāda school. Therefore I have no chance of knowing what kṛṣṇa-bhakti is.
